MOST REALISTIC MOBILE RACING GAME

- Cars behave realistically on all surfaces - asphalt, sand, grass

- Drive on highly detailed roads

- Attitude control regulations

- Eye-to-eye races, stand against another player to prove who is the best

- Live cameras and spectacular replays

- Body+wheels painting

- Improving the technical characteristics of your car

FEATURES

  • The most realistic 3D drift racing simulation on mobile devices;
  • Different levels of difficulty, from beginner to professional driver;
  • Highly customizable: change the color of the body, the body vinyl, wheels, rims color and lettering tires;
  • Flexible configuration options: increased engine power, add turbo change processing parameters (weight distribution, camber angle and so on), the switching gear ratios;
  • Photo mode to share your cool photos of drift with friends in facebook vkontakte. tweeter and much more;
  • Professional engine sound for every car with turbo whistle and exhaust;
  • The calculation of the angle of drift, the greater the angle the more points;
  • Steep music tracks, dubstep, rock, hard rock, electro.
  • Optimized for Intel x86 mobile devices.

    CAUTION! This game can absorb you for many hours, do not forget to take a break every 40 minutes!

    Be ready to ride with improved performance cars (turbo or naturally aspirated) and passing tracks at maximum speed at a large angle of drift.

    Improve your skills drifter, and have a new experience in driving your car, seizing its characteristics.

    Earn experience and compete with your friends and earn achievements.

    Important tips:

    - Your ernings, achieved cars and tracks are stored on your device
